column5: This year for the first time in many years, we will driving through the night on the way to Canada. Are there any reasonally price liquor or beer stores that are open all night near International Falls? I am guessing the duty free store will be closed. But does anyone out there know for sure? We would probably be passing through the border around 4:00 am. Want to purchase before we cross the border and don't want to haul it any further than we have to. Pat T
